name: Block Shock
overview: This game has really beautiful music and graphics. Interesting concept, having to shoot parts into place instead of blasting them out of there. In Block Shock you're the last chance for millions of people on your planet. Some strange buildings from far, far away cause a serious danger to the peaceful life. You just have one chance: destroy the buildings by forming them into a rectangle. Published in Italy as The Wall in Formula 64 n.98.
